徇.definition: to give in to; to be swayed by (personal considerations etc); Taiwan pr. [xun2]; to follow; to expose publicly; variant of 侚[xun4]; variant of 殉[xun4]

徇情.definition: to act out of personal considerations; to show partiality

徇情枉法.definition: see 徇私枉法[xun4 si1 wang3 fa3]

徇私枉法.definition: to bend the law in order to favor one's relatives or associates (idiom)

徇私舞弊.definition: (idiom) to abuse one's position for personal gain
